sentences.en: All this talk seemed to me so futile.
sentences.cn: 所有这些谈话在我看来全都白费.

sentences.en: Any added word would have been commonplace and futile.
sentences.cn: 再说任何话都会是平凡无聊,毫无价值的.

sentences.en: He brought his arm up in a futile attempt to ward off the blow.
sentences.cn: 他扬起胳膊徒劳地想要挡住这一拳。

sentences.en: He concluded that resistance was futile.
sentences.cn: 他断定抵抗是毫无用处的.

sentences.en: He died for Germany in the gigantic and futile operation called Citadel.
sentences.cn: 他在被称为“城堡”行动的一次大规模的劳而无功的战役中阵亡.

sentences.en: His efforts to save the business were futile.
sentences.cn: 他挽救企业的努力未能奏效.

sentences.en: I would become disgusted with my futile daydreams.
sentences.cn: 我就讨厌自己那种虚无的梦想.

sentences.en: It is always futile to try to hold back the progress of history.
sentences.cn: 要想阻止历史潮流是徒劳的.

sentences.en: It was a strange, weird, interesting and yet futile battle of wits.
sentences.cn: 这是希奇 、 古怪 、 有趣、但是徒然的斗智.

sentences.en: My efforts to go back to sleep proved futile.
sentences.cn: 我努力想再次入睡，但怎么也睡不着。

sentences.en: That futile young man does nothing but waste money.
sentences.cn: 那个没出息的青年人只会浪费钱.

sentences.en: The forces of unreason destroy one another in futile strife.
sentences.cn: 而那些非理性的力量则在无益的倾轧中互相毁灭.

sentences.en: Their costly and futile attempt to subjugate the Afghans lasted just 10 years.
sentences.cn: 他们大动干戈想要控制阿富汗地区，但只持续了10年就无果而终了。

sentences.en: Their efforts to revive him were futile.
They were killed, to the last man, in a futile attack.
sentences.cn: 因为进攻失败,他们全部被杀, 无一幸免.

sentences.en: This caused the utmost anxiety and rendered all concentration futile.
sentences.cn: 这引起了莫大的焦虑,而且使一切力量的集中都前功尽弃.

words.tran_cn: 没有前途的；没有希望的

trans.tran_cn: 无效的，无用的，没有出息的，琐碎的，无关紧要的，一场空
trans.tran_en: actions that are futile are useless because they have no chance of being successful
